text: Ordered the joules range patterdale 4 seater and cuddle chair. It was delivered on time I was up stairs working while the men bought it on and put the feet on my husband was making then tea only to find when they have gone that I have three different colour/ style feet on each sofa so I had brown oak thin spindal type legs on the front and on one side of the back I have a light beech square shaped leg and on the other side a dark brown square shaped leg with a bunny pattern on. I called them up and it took five days and three more phone calls for them to get back to me, then I had to send them photos to prove what I meant about the legs.  Now I have to wait until the end of Jan 22 for someone to come out look at the legs and order the correct ones and the arrange for them to come back and fit them on. what a joke.

I wanted a gift card for my sister’s birthday.  The woman I spoke with was very efficient in taking care of me.  The entire transaction took all of 10 minutes and my sister got her gift card within hours.  She loves Bluestone Perrenials so she was thrilled for the gift card

reply.message: Hi Henry, terribly sorry to hear as this should never be the case. Thanks for bringing it to our attention. We will be looking into the staffing at the store promptly and adjust accordingly. A member of our management team will reach out to you personally to express our gratitude for sharing this feedback with us and apologize for the inconvenience we have caused you albeit not intentional however, we still take full responsibility as your experience is extremely important to us. Thank you for your business. With much gratitude, Customer Care
text: Nice furniture store, but it was a power struggle with sales people.  Just left a bad taste in our mouths.
Needed a mattress and ordered in less than 10 minutes

reply.message:
Good Morning, 

Thank you so much for taking the time to write us a 5* review. Your feedback is much appreciated. We are really happy to hear that you had a great experience in-store with Mohammed. 

Kind Regards,

Haseeb S 
DFS Customer Support
text: Mohammed was amazing gave some great advice and so pleased with my choice and his recommendations

reply.message: Hello, thank you for bringing this to our attention. Certainly not the experience we would have expected as this is not reflective of our standards and Customer commitment. We are terribly sorry and will look into this matter and reach out to you direct.  Thank you for your business. With much respect, Customer Care
text: Was quoted a price over the phone but was billed for a different, higher price. Learned that the quoted price was not including all the pieces I had requested. After paying the increased price, realized the order that had been placed was still incorrect and ended up costing even more.

reply.message:
Good afternoon Tim, 

Thank you for providing us with this feedback. All of our extras are optional and we do like to ensure all customers are aware of the extras available as they may be suitable for you. 

I do apologise if you feel the delivery fee is high, this does include full installation into your room of choice by our 2 man team. We also remove all packaging and dispose of this in a responsible and sustainable way.

Kind Regards,
Holly  M
DFS Central Customer Support
text: Sofa looks good, but the salesperson wanted to add on a whole load of extra costs. Don’t like these hidden costs, and makes me feel that DFS is not a top trader like Next or M&S. delivery is a staggering £100 ! This is outrageous.

reply.message:
Hello Lisa, 

Thank you for writing us a review, we are glad to hear you are happy with the product received. Unfortunately DFS do not assemble beds, this information is listed in the 'product information' section on the website, I do apologise for any confusion caused by this. 

Kind Regards,
Holly M
DFS Central Customer Support
text: Beautiful bed, super speedy delivery, however, I bought the bed from dfs as my bed was as expensive as a sofa and thought that dfs would build the bed……..clearly I was mistaken, dfs do not build beds, which is very disappointing.  I’ve had to pay someone to build it for me.

reply.message:
Good afternoon David, 

Thank you for taking the time to write to us, please accept our apologies for the poor experience you have faced with DFS, this is certainly not the service we aim to provide. 

Unfortunately, as no order reference number has been provided we are unable to locate your order. However, if you would like to discuss this matter further please do not hesitate to contact our Customer Service Team on 0333 9999 777 and choose option 4. 

Kind Regards,
Holly M
DFS Customer Support
text: Would be a zero but 1 is minimum. Absolutely appalling customer service. Bought 2 sofa’s which were delivered damaged. DFS came to inspect them and took pictures of 2&3 seater sofas ,both with damage . DFS then phoned to say that I had agreed that the 2 seater was fine (which was not the case) . They offered a very small compensation amount which was not acceptable,then told me that they would take back the sofa’s but would not replace them with the same ones as the new ones might also arrive damaged!! This has been a fight for 5-6 weeks to get a resolution,which is now that DFS will take the sofa’s back and I will be left with no sofa’s for probably 10-12 weeks until I get new ones(which will not be from DFS). Absolutely disgusted with the treatment we have received from a big company.

reply.message: Hello Chris! I am sorry to see the 2 star review, and apologize for the frustrating experience. I will advise we have a multitude of options in regards to offering assistance. Whether that be by phone, chat, or email. We do operate within our store hours, so please be aware if you did try contacting us outside of those hours, staff are not available. If you have questions, or are still looking for assistance, pleases let us know at https://www.nfm.com/customer-services/. Have a great day!
text: Tried to contact someone to help with questions and no one was available.  You need more help.
$100 for delivery when i live 10-15 miles from the showroom. That is simply a money grab.
Bill was very helpful!

reply.message:
HI Chris,

Our Delivery charge is the same across the board, as this allows us to offer our great delivery service, where your furniture is assembled in a room of your choice by professionals and the packaging your furniture arrives in is then disposed of in a responsible manner.

Many thanks,

Lauren Siviter
DFS Head Office Customer Service
Tel: 0333 9999777
text: Only thing I didn’t like was the price of delivery.
the plants were half dead and tiny.  for the price i would expect so much more.  i cannot use these plants for my clients.  so disappointed.
It was a great experience from start to finish

reply.message: Nicole, thank you for your feedback. A member from our team will be in contact with you regarding your experience.
text:
Previously in the year, we had made a large purchase with Gardner White, and were supposed to have free delivery for a whole year. There was also a sale, and as such, we decided to return to Gardner White for our furniture needs. However, it turns out, there's a catch of course. After choosing our product, the salesman said we didn't spend enough this time to get free delivery. We expressed our disappointment over this issue, and the salesmen left to "see what he could do". In the end, he made it seem like he was was doing us a favor, when in fact, they just didn't give us the full discount from the sale and we paid roughly the same price w/ or w/out the sale to compensate for the delivery charge. 
To make matters worse, when our items were to be delivered, the delivery people had the wrong products. So in the end, we waited all day for a delivery, and ended up with no product. When we called to address this with the store, no one apologized for the trouble or inconvenience, and we ended up having to wait another week for what we actually paid for.

reply.message:
Hi Dianne,
  I'm so sorry, but the bulbs had to travel from Holland and we are so glad that they did arrive even late.  Hopefully you will give us another chance. Stay Well! Pat
text: I waited two weeks after ordering and not hearing a thing before I emailed support. I got a reply a day later saying the supplier had not gotten stock to Bluestone. Another week passed before I finally got a shipping email. Not sure I will order again from here.

reply.message:
Good morning Mrs Whiteley,

Thank you so much for taking the time to write us a 5* review, your feedback is always appreciated. We are really happy to hear that you had a great experience in store with Reece. 

Kind regards,

Lia 
DFS Customer Support
text: Reece was very helpful not pushy, only disappointment was the fact you can't get any additional discount for paying in full I would have thought in this day and age it would be worth something v 4 or 5 yrs interest free whatever it was.

reply.message: Thank you for your feedback, LIndsey. We appreciate your honesty about your experience with this and would love to investigate this further. So that we can, please contact our Support team at 1-800-216-5232.
text: Significantly overpriced equipment, salesperson didn’t mention he was checking my credit, he also didn’t follow up as he said.  I had to ask him how much and how long the equipment would be paid for before he even specified. I’m confused why it’s so costly when I already had an alarm system and all the tech did was change out a few pieces that were already there. When I finally had time to compare prices, I was going to cancel but he told me I had a week to cancel. The paperwork to cancel only said 3 days so it was too late.

reply.message: We're sorry this was your experience, Robin and want to look into this right aways.  Watch for our email so we can dig into this.
text: The tech and Vivint customer service couldn't align on pricing of the equipment, making it look as though Vivint is dishonest with their pricing. The tech took almost 4 hours to install simple equipment. The tech tried to upsell me on equipment that it was obvious I didn't need, equipment that I already had. There was supposed to be a survey presented to me at the end. It is shown on camera where the tech left, almost without giving me the default pin to get into the newly installed system, and then walked back up to my my walkway to ask for the pin to get into the survey. At the time of giving him the pin, I didn't realize what was taking place. I'm assuming he used the pin to fill out the survey for himself, giving himself great ratings that he did not deserve.
